enhanced_description: Hero Vired, an edtech venture by Hero Group, offers a comprehensive learning platform designed for post-schooling students, professionals, and higher education aspirants. The platform emphasizes interactive support, peer communication, and engaging online classes, with 80% live sessions promoting active learning and community building through forums. Programs are specifically tailored to meet industry demands and are developed in collaboration with global universities and organizations, including notable partnerships with MIT, Cambridge, and Codecademy. The curriculum incorporates actionable learning through industry projects and masterclasses with experts, focusing on practical skill development and real-world career advancement. Learners receive personalized support via dedicated 1-on-1 consulting sessions with mentors, offering individualized career guidance and addressing specific needs. Key features also include support for CV and LinkedIn profile building, and interview preparation, all aimed at accelerating skill development and learning efficiency to cultivate innovators and changemakers.
